aka: Hyper Projection Play "Haikyuu!!" The Summer of Evolution
this_title: ハイパープロジェクション演劇えんげき「ハイキュー!!」"進化しんかの夏なつ
trans_title: Hyper Projection舞台剧“排球少年!!”进化之夏
Hyper Projection Play "Haikyuu!!" The Summer of Evolution
introduction: The fourth stage play adaption of Haruichi Furudate's Haikyū!! series. The stage play covered the aftermath of Karasuno's loss to Aobajohsai and their subsequent training camp in Tokyo.
chinese_title: Hyper Projection舞台剧“排球少年!!”进化之夏
foreign_title: ハイパープロジェクション演劇えんげき「ハイキュー!!」"進化しんかの夏なつ
